/// Welcome Screen Welcome How To Play? Choose The Animal Do not Forget To Take a Hint Lets Get Started Welcome to Animal Sounds, scroll to find out how the game is played. Press the bottom button and play the sound. Choose the picture of the animal you hear and score points The heart icon you see in the menu indicates how many lives you have left. You can earn 10 lives by clicking on the video icon next to it. The light bulb icon will help you figure out which animals voice is coming from, so you can get help if you cant understand the sound.
